## Installation

You can install the development version of vHyDeg like so:

``` r
install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("rujinlong/vhydeg")
# remotes::install_github("deng-lab/vhydeg")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

``` r
library(vhydeg)
## basic example code
```

The vHyDeg database is available at: [https://deng-lab.github.io/vhydeg](https://deng-lab.github.io/vhydeg).
